title: GRSE Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Expert and Specialist Posts
description: Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers (GRSE) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Expert and Specialist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the GRSE Recruitment 2025 . For more information, like age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the posts mentioned be...
